frontmatter.title: The Most Under-utilised Gym Motivation Tool: the Gym Crush
frontmatter.description: Gym Crushes are well too common, and they make our day better just to see them in the same space as us. Enjoy them as you get ripped for chances are they won't last, unlike the habits they help form.
keywords: what to do about the gym crush
should I talk to my gym crush
